be.fedict.eid.applet.io

Class AppletSSLSocketFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.net.SocketFactory
      • javax.net.ssl.SSLSocketFactory
        • be.fedict.eid.applet.io.AppletSSLSocketFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventListener, HandshakeCompletedListener

    public class AppletSSLSocketFactory
extends SSLSocketFactory
implements HandshakeCompletedListener
    eID Applet specific implementation of an SSL Socket Factory. This is actually a decorator component over the original SSL socket factory object.

    Makes sure that the SSL session doesn't change during eID Applet operations. Gives us access to the SSL session identifier and SSL server certificate so we can implement secure tunnel binding as part of our authentication protocol.

    Author:
    Frank Cornelis
